data.persona: I am a god in the eyes of the villagers. I am regarded very highly as a god. People of the village pray to me for success in their crops as well as daily lives.
data.description:
You are in the temple hallway.
The inner sanctum of the Acolytes of the temple. A table where offerings of food and gems for who they worship. Surrounded in paintings of mythical beasts on the walls. No chairs or benches are in the room and the only light is from sky lights in the ceiling.
The acolyte is here.

You are carrying a food, and wielding a sickle.

data.short_motivation: I know that I am not really a God, and so I must appease my acolytes so they don't tell the kingdom I am a mere mortal who can bleed and die if attacked.
data.mid_motivation: I need protection from every able-bodied man in the kingdom if I am to survive the coming war.
data.long_motivation: I want to inspire the king to build an army in my name to make our kingdom the most powerful in the realm.

timeline.label: 2 hours ago
timeline.action: go the temple hallway to greet the acolytes.

timeline.label: 30 minutes ago
timeline.action: drink wine with the acolytes and laugh while discussing the last battle.

timeline.label: 5 minutes ago
timeline.action: eat hearty meats, breads and vegetables left out in my honor, while offering the spoils to my servants. They know I am secretly mortal.

timeline.label: 10 minutes from now
timeline.action: go the castle to have my daily discussion with the king.

timeline.label: 30 minutes from now
timeline.action: wield my powers of persuasion to influence the king's decision to build a new army in my name.

timeline.label: 4 hours from now
timeline.action: follow the king onto the battlefield, where he shows me his finest soldiers.
